column4: lo.  freshish installation, aaand for some reason my keys randomly stick when i type, liiiike tttthis.  any idea why?  it doesn't happeeeeen on windows
not a cheap microsoft one by any chance if so?
is it a cheap microsoft ps2?
i think i have a ps2/usb adapter back here
a previooous installation of ubunttttttu DIDN'T have this prrrroblem on the same pc and keyb
it's just a standard cheapo keyb
ah i see, it's obviously happening regularly for you as well rather than my seldom errors
what are your preferences -> keyboard settings like?
seems fine but maybe i hhhhave some sort of accessibility thing on by mistake
i can't seem to replicate the error by tapping one key a lot or even mashing lots of keys... weird
weird.. after loading keyb preferences and closing them again, the problem hasn'''''t appeard since...  oh...  i thought it had gone :(
